price: (39) And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk.
arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wal-qamara qaddarnāhu manāzila ḥattā ʿāda kal-ʿur'jūni al-qadīmi
